activities: Weil is an international law firm with offices and clients located throughout the world.  Weil receives and utilizes personal information in connection with its business, including for marketing and development purposes, to provide legal services to clients and potential clients, and to manage its own human resources functions.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Croatia, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
personaldata: Organization, client, and data produced to the Firm in the course of legal representation, all of which may be electronically or manually processed.
recoursemech: For unresolved complaints, Weil will cooperate with JAMS.
